_librariesioMetadata.description: Open Source ZXP Installer for Adobe Extensions

name: zxpinstaller
description: An simple cross platform ZXP installer.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
scripts.build:osx: npm run clean:osx && electron-packager ./app "OpenAsset For InDesign Installer" --out=release/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.25.3 --icon=assets/osx/icon.icns --app-bundle-id="com.axomic.openasset.indesign-extension" --app-version="1.0.30"
scripts.build:win: npm run clean:win && electron-packager ./app "OpenAsset For InDesign Installer" --out=release/win --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.25.3 --icon=assets/win/icon.ico --app-bundle-id="com.axomic.openasset.indesign-extension" --app-version="1.0.30"
scripts.pack: npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
scripts.pack:osx: npm run build:osx && electron-builder "release/osx/OpenAsset For InDesign Installer.app" --platform=osx --out="release/osx" --config=packager.json
scripts.pack:win: npm run build:win && electron-builder "release/win/OpenAsset For InDesign Installer-win32" --platform=win --out="release/win" --config=packager.json

author: Axomic Ltd
